Keeping Busy

Posted on March 11, 2025

Haskell

module Main where

main :: IO ()
main = putStrLn "Hello, World!"

Python

if __name__ == '__main__':
    print("Hello, World!")

C

#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
  printf("Hello, World!");
}
